column6: When an insanely powerful, legendary enemy threatens the entire planet, will the Hulk and his army of rebels fight alone - or join forces with the Empire?  Plus, stunning revelations and shocking developments regarding Caiera the Oldstrong, the Emperor's gray-skinned Shadow Guard.  And Miek and his hivelings come face-to-face with the destiny of their species.
column8: | inker:Sandu Florea | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Aaron Lopresti | writer:Greg Pak | colorist:Chris Sotomayor
